There&#39;s lot of monk classes for DW. Which is your favorite and why? 
<div id='comment z13yzj2jcqn2djh2m22uyt2agumhtdh34'>

<div id='comment z13yzj2jcqn2djh2m22uyt2agumhtdh34'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/117135021755805136927_photo.jpg'> Nick Nunes</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-10-06 17:42:40 (edited: 2017-10-06 17:42:40)</cite></p>
        <p>I have read at least six different monk playbooks and none of them were exactly what I wanted. I specifically was looking for a monk playbook that was comparable to the base classes, i.e. some flavor, but mostly generic with a few cool signature moves. I ended up creating my own, but wasn&#39;t 100% happy with it either. Of the available ones my favorites were from Donjon World by Ben Rosenbloom and the Lore and Lords pack by Peter J.</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13yzj2jcqn2djh2m22uyt2agumhtdh34'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/100410765634052727875_photo.jpg'> Addramyr Palinor</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-10-06 18:03:49 (edited: 2017-10-06 18:03:57)</cite></p>
        <p>I feel ya!<br /><br />Both of which are... on Drivethru?</p>
</div>
